item.description: tool to measure the depth of cut of the chainsaw chain
item.author: camaleon662

item.title: Customizable tube cutter for Hot End Fix
item.description:
This is a customizable variant of the cutter aid for the "Original Hot End Fix for Creality".
I created this one, because the original did not leave enough space for the cutting blade and broke too easily.
The default setting cuts at the recommended 31.3mm for Creality Ender 3 (+ pro and V2).
It assumes your cutting blade is 0.6mm thick and makes the cut in the middle.
I've also set the width for the tube to exactly 4.0mm to better keep the tube in place, once fitted. Enlarge the diameter if you want an easier fit.
item.author: b457144n

item.title: [In Progress][Testing] Pentacon Six - Nikon F adapter for Юпитер-36Б Lens
item.author: dmitribatulin

item.title: Speaker Stands (IKEA MULIG mod)
item.description:
Speaker Holder from IKEA MULIG

Printer settings

For 4 stands print:

  • 20220103_Ikea_Connector_v3.stl x 4
  • 20220103_Ikea_fussv2*.stl x 4
  • 20220103_Ikea_Kabelv1.stl x 8

For 2 stands print:

  • 20220103_Ikea_Connector_v3.stl x 2
  • 20220103_Ikea_fussv2*.stl x 2
  • 20220103_Ikea_Kabelv1.stl x 4

Very easy to print. I used PLA with an infill of 100.

Used items for 4 stands

  • 2x Ikea MULIGs
    https://www.ikea.com/us/en/p/mulig-clothes-rack-white-60179434/
  • 4x Generic speaker wall mount eg.:
    https://www.amazon.com/WALI-Adjustments-Bookshelf-Surrounding-SWM402/dp/B0784876S1/ref=sr_1_8?keywords=speaker+mount&qid=1643368575&sr=8-8

Used tools

  • Cheap hacksaw with mitre eg.:
    https://www.amazon.com/HAUTMEC-hacksaw-adjustable-cutting-HT0034-PL/dp/B07CSK7TCD/ref=sr_1_3?keywords=hacksaw+with+miter+box&qid=1643368792&sprefix=hacksaw+with+m%2Caps%2C158&sr=8-3

Build instruction

  1. Disassemble the Mulig
  2. Take the straight rod with threads on both ends and saw it into two pieces of 30cm.
    IMPORTANT each piece must have a thread on one side.
  3. Use the leftover piece from the middle of the straight rod for the vertical feet. Saw them into pieces of 14 cm.
  4. Take the curved feet from the Mulig and stick it into the vertical rod (like in the original building instruction)
    5.Thighten them with one of the 30cm pieces.
  5. Take a printed 20220103_Ikea_Connector_v3 and attach it to the end of the 30cm piece (glue can be helpful).
  6. Stick the 14cm feet into the other opening from the 20220103_Ikea_Connector_v3
  7. Take the printed 20220103_Ikea_fussv2* and put it over the end of the 14cm piece. The size of the 20220103_Ikea_fussv2 (1mm or 2mm) depends on your sawing-skills.
  8. Screw the generic speaker wall mount on the top part of the long rod (other side of the curved foot, where you would screw on the top part of the Mullig).
  9. Attach your speaker to the mount
  10. Clip the 20220103_Ikea_Kabel on the vertical rod and run the cables through the holes of the clip

Background

After we moved to our new flat we bought two Ikea MULIG Clothes rack to temporarily store our clothes. After our bedroom closet was delivered the racks were just lying around and since I wanted to buy a speaker stand for my Logitech Z906 5.1 I decided to use the MULIGs.

item.title: Parkside X20V Team battery LED light with mini voltmeter
item.description:
I really liked the original idea from jaaanik but I was worried of over discharging the battery so I added a place where I can fit a small inexpensive mini voltmeter. You can find these in any electronic store or on aliexpress or other websites.

For printing place it facing upwards (bottom is where the voltmeter comes fitted afterwards) and enable support which touches the buildplate. A good brim is also recommended.

item.author: HeidMIc

item.title: HoverMower, DIY lawn mower based ion Hoverboards
item.description:
This is Hovermower, a 3D printable lawn mower based on Hoverboard. A Hoverboard is a self-balancing board (toy). I tooked the powerful BLDC motors, PCB as motor driver, Battery, charger and LED headlights to build a lawn mower around this.

HoverMower is equipped with a moving chassis. This means, most part of chassis (the white one) is able to move a bit to detect collisions with obstacles

As I found Thingiverse buggy in past months, and because this project is pretty complex, too complex to be posted here, I created a Git Organization with lots of repositories.

You can find everything you need here:

Documentation: http://www.hovermower.github.io
STL and STEP Files: https://github.com/HoverMower/hovermower-chassis
Git organization with even more related repos: https://github.com/HoverMower
item.author: PaddyCube

It clips into 2020 profile to hold wires crossing them perpendicularly.

item.title: Duino-coin mining rig for ESP32
item.description:
Mining rig for five ESP32 boards and a 70mm fan.
I soldered the five boards in series to power only the bottom one by cable.
Print two side cover pieces. I glued the pieces with hot glue to be able to open easily if I have to update the boards.

More information about Duino-coin and how to get started: https://duinocoin.com/getting-started

item.title: RC Kanister / Halterungen/ 1:10 / Traxxas
item.description:
Hallo hier mal ein Paar Kanister und auch Halterung zum Befestigen.

1 Fach
2 Fach
Normal
Breit

Kann als PETG oder PLA gedruckt werden

Die Kanister können auch befüllt werden. Die Wandung sind auch etwas dicker, damit sie auch direkt an der Karosse verschraubt werden können.

Ihr benötigt noch ein Gummiband zum Befestigen.

Hier mal ein Beispiel:

https://www.amazon.de/Elastic-Kordel-1-5-mm-schwarz/dp/B0064B9MPS/ref=sr_1_7?__mk_de_DE=%C3%85M%C3%85%C5%BD%C3%95%C3%91&crid=B00KSU3E8IOU&keywords=Gummiband+Expanderseil+1%2C5mm&qid=1643368669&sprefix=gummiband+expanderseil+1+5mm%2Caps%2C80&sr=8-7

1mm solltet ihr bestellen da die Löcher zur Befestigung maximal 1,5mm sind und ihr ja noch einen Knoten machen müsst zum fest mach.

item.author: Shureg

item.title: Non air Hopper
item.description:
This is a G gauge model of a 10T non air coal hopper used on the Hunter Valley coal fields. This particular design was used by the Pelaw Main Colliery. The main hopper is printed upside down using supports touching build plate only. The frame itself slots together. I have included built in supports on the side frame but you will need to add supports on the inner end frame. The frame is glued together with medium superglue and sprayed with a kicker. Very important to use an accelerator as this creates heat which helps bond the PLA. The hopper can be glued to the frame but it was removable in real life.
The axles are from 3mm rod and can be pressed into the wheels under a drill press using the jig supplied. The center jig ensures the correct back to back of the flanges. Alternatively LGB wheel sets can be used. There is just enough flex in the frame to install the wheel sets after the frame has been assembled and painted. I have included a coupler adapter to fit LGB style couplers. This is screwed in place under the inner end frame. Holes are included to take 10mm long 3mm screws.
The main tow hook can be used with 3 link chain. 11.5mm long by 1.8mm diameter clock chain was used. The hook stood up to the weight of six wagons without weight be shunted back and forth without breaking.
This was printed in PLA using .2 layer height.
Still have to design brake gear which is installed on one side so I will add this soon.
item.author: dako1966

item.title: Heewing Ranger T1: Insta360GO2 support including air intake
item.description:
This is a compact and reliable support. It includes the air intake without having the Insta poping high above the fuselage. it replace the stock air intake front cover of the plane.
It must be printed in TPU without any support

item.author: tipex

item.title: Sprung wire management clips for 2020 profile
item.description:
This is a re-modelling of the wire clips I've referenced as remix. I set out to make 3 sizes instead of one and I've reshaped the clipping part to get a much tighter fit against the Ender 2020 extrusions.

  • the part that sets on the outside of the extrusion has been reshaped to be a 45 degree slope;
  • the length of the narrowest part of the spring has been shortened;
  • I've created 2 more clips with different inner diameters - 11mm [close to original], 8.5mm, 6.2mm;

Donations accepted: https://ko-fi.com/pjvenda
item.author: pjvenda

item.title: Octogoose inverse cyclone bee escape
item.description: This is a bee escape which kind of looks like 8 geese, or maybe ducks. Inspired by the workings of a tesla valve the idea is that the bees will turn around if they attempt to get back up into the super. It probably works, but has not yet been tested.

item.author: the7thshepard

item.title: Nintendo Famicom Power Vamp v3 clip-on slot cover
item.description:
Background on the Power Vamp v3 (https://backofficeshow.com/shop/famicom-psu-av-replacement-board)

If you have ever tried getting your Nintendo Famicom working on a modern TV then you will know how much of a pain it can be! With this “No case modding needed!” upgrade you will get going in minutes! The Powervamp board replaces the original PSU and RF modulator to give you crisp composite out!

To continue the zero case modding benefits, this 3D printable cover clips onto the Power Vamp AV socket and closes up the slots that the original RF modulator / power board required!
item.author: backofficeshow

item.author: hellas3Dmodeling

item.title: Warp Core Table Lamp - Inner Core (LED-Stripes WS2812B)
item.description:
Please read first the complete summary!
Bitte zuerst die vollständige Zusammenfassung lesen!

--- English ---

Not everything has to be printed!
The inner core consists of several parts that can be combined individually.
In my case I made the complete inner core as I wanted to do without any other materials.

There is a 10mm hole for the wiring through the inner core.

The following parts should be printed in white if possible so that they do not shimmer through the transparent light areas:

  • Light_Step
  • spacer

The rest each in the color of the actual lamp.

Brief description of each file:

Tech_Base.stl

an elevation is constructed here so that the controller and cables can be accommodated.

Light_Step.stl

5 pieces are required for each area. The LED strip is inserted through the openings.
The distance between the individual LEDs on the tape should be 16mm under optimal circumstances. I used a 5 meter LED strip with 300 LEDs for this, the distances are correct.

Middle_Lightring.stl

The LEDs are arranged horizontally here after the prints have been glued. The connection cable can be routed through the support hole.

Spacer.stl

Is a simple spacer between the top two light areas.

Head_Positioner.stl

Holds the top cap of the lamp in place without the need for gluing for maintenance.

--- Deutsch ---

Es muss nicht zwingend alles gedruckt werden!
Der innere Kern besteht aus mehreren Teilen, die individuell kombiniert werden können.
In meinem Fall habe ich den gesamten inneren Kern hergestellt, da ich ohne weitere Materialien auskommen wollte.

Durch den gesamten Kern geht eine 10mm Bohrung für die Verkabelung.

Folgende Teile sollten möglichst in weiß gedruckt werden, dass diese nicht durch die transparenten Lichtbereiche durch schimmern:

  • Light_Step
  • Distancer

Der Rest jeweils in der Farbe der eigentlichen Lampe.

Kurze Beschreibung der einzelnen Dateien:

Tech_Base.stl
hier ist eine Erhöhung konstruiert, sodass der Controller untergebracht werden kann sowie Kabel.

Light_Step.stl

Je 5 Stück werden für einen Bereich benötigt. Das LED-Band wird durch die Öffnungen gesteckt.
Der Abstand der einzelnen LED's auf dem Band sollte unter optimalen Umständen 16mm betragen. Ich habe dafür ein 5 Meter LED-Band mit 300 LED's verwenden, hier stimmen die Abstände.

Middle_Lightring.stl

Die LED's werden hier horizontal nach der Verklebung der Drucke angeracht. Durch das Supportloch kann das Anschlusskabel geführt werden.

Distancer.stl

Ist ein einfacher Abstandshalter zwischen den beiden oberen Lichtbereichen.

Head_Positioner.stl

Hält den obersten Deckel der Lampe an Ort und Stelle ohne das dieser Verklebt werden muss zu Wartungszwecken.
item.author: open_mind_interest
